Name: OUBEY VR – Reise der Monaden
About the game: This work which dates from 1982 deals with Leibniz’s Monadology. This metaphysical theory which posits that the universe consists of inseparable immortal substances endowed with souls and spirits intrigued OUBEY so much that he dedicated this painting to it. This VR takes you to the very centre of the monad universe where you’re totally surrounded by the enchanting diversity of the painting’s elements. And you can touch these elements too, play with them, float them, fly them and let them cavort freely through the depths of space.
